content:
441 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (xviii) ILORIN requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes in five 
(5) subjects including English Language, Mathematics 
and three (3) of the following subjects: Economics, 
Social Studies, Fine Arts, Civic Education, Government, 
Commerce, Marketing and Business Management.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) DELSU  requires  two  (2)  of 
 Economics,  
Geography/Physics, Government and History.  
(ii) BENIN requires Mathematics and any two (2) of 
Economics, Government and Geography.  
(iii) CALABAR same as in Education Arts.  
(iv) IAUED – Same as in Geography Education.  
(v) EBSU accepts any three (3) Arts or Social Science 
subjects.  
(vi) AAUA requires three (3) of Economics, Geography, 
Biology/Agricultural Science,Christian Religious 
Studies/Islamic Studies Government /History.  
(vii) ILORIN requires Mathematics plus two (2) other Social 
Science subjects from Economics, Fine Arts, 
Government, Commerce and Geography.
